title: THE GRAVES THEORY

embed.description: →KINGUIN, use code 'RED' to save 3% on all games! http://www.kinguin.net/7en/2vc →Subscribe Here: http://full.sc/1gukNqq →Did You Know Playlist: http://full.sc/1bCtY0m →Chat/Game with your friends, Razer Comms: http://rzr.to/jAdIQ →Friends' LoL Channel + Comp Deals: http://www.youtube.com/user/ThePoqito Secret Hidden Lore Between Zed and Nocturne, are they the same champion?

body:
based on the theory that nocturne is zed from the future and nocturne came back
in time,  i came up with the theory that graves is also from the future and 
came back in time as well to kill nocturne, think about it, graves has 1 quote 
with another champion and who may that be, nocturne! I don't think he knows of
Nocturne's past of Nocturne being zed, but lets take a look at the evidence.
It is obvious that Graves teamed up with twisted fate, later on, but when he 
arrived in this time he had to survive and adapt for a little whilst learning.
This explains his lore about learning all the tricks of the street. After a
while Graves met with twisted fate and they were an instant pair and as said
in the official lore of Graves, both he and twisted fate knew the stakes of
their arrangement and twisted fate betrayed him. Does this sound familiar to
anyone? Any Wolverine fans. X-men Origins Wolverine. A rugged man who has hi
mind set on killing a specific man teams up with a gambler to fight someone 
who is practically invincible, who else seems invincible, zed. With
his death animation being him fall into a shadow pit im sure that Nocturne 
would have kept this nifty ability to survive when necessary. But when it 
got to Graves finding Nocturne for their first fight as what happens in X-men
Graves loses his memory and twisted fate betrays him and leaves him, he was
captured by people and sent off to a prison where they want to keep Graves
away from others and find out his secrets, with memory loss all he can 
are glimpses of his life and the main thing going through his mind, are cards
from twisted fate, and the shadows of nocturne, you may think this is crazy
but think about it, Graves q buckshot shoots three projectiles, his r
COLLATERAL DAMAGE where he hits his first target dealing major damage and then
explosive damage hitting others but with less of an impact. his e a dash, who
can do all these things, wolverine he has 3 claws, and when he jumps at people
with his claws the first person he hits dies almost instantly, and the rest may
take damage but most of the time it is not as severe. and he is agile able to
dash at an instant. Anyway you can see the evidence that Graves is apparently
from the future but he doesn't know it because he can't remember, bunt what he
can remember is being betrayed by twisted fate because he came back alone (that
we believe) and he developed a relationship with only one person and then 
getting stabbed in the back, that hurts so he has set out on revenge for the
simple fact that the only person that he trusted and cared about betrayed him.
But subconsciously he knows that he is supposed to kill nocturne so he has a
natural hate of darkness and so the quote "i got your darkness" meaning i got
you Nocturne, but he doesn't even know he's saying this, this is his subconscious
talking and not him so he can't figure it out if he doesn't know it happened.{{champion:104}}
